thread.title: BRIEF-U.S. FDA Observes Alembic Pharma Failed To Review Any Unexplained Discrepancy On Inspection Of Co's Panelav Plant - CNBC TV18

title: BRIEF-U.S. FDA Observes Alembic Pharma Failed To Review Any Unexplained Discrepancy On Inspection Of Co's Panelav Plant - CNBC TV18

organizations.name: fda observes alembic pharma failed to review any unexplained discrepancy on inspection of co

text:
Market News April 6, 2018 / 5:29 AM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-U.S. FDA Observes Alembic Pharma Failed To Review Any Unexplained Discrepancy On Inspection Of Co's Panelav Plant - CNBC TV18 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 6 (Reuters) - 
* USFDA OBSERVES ALEMBIC PHARMA FAILED TO REVIEW ANY UNEXPLAINED DISCREPANCY AFTER INSPECTION OF CO’S PANELAV PLANT ON MARCH 12-20 -CNBC TV18 
* USFDA OBSERVES ALEMBIC PHARMA EMPLOYEES NOT GIVEN TRAINING IN OPS THEY PERFORM AFTER INSPECTION OF CO’S PANELAV PLANT ON MARCH 12-20 -CNBC TV18 
* USFDA OBSERVES ALEMBIC PHARMA HAS NO WRITTEN PROCEDURES FOR PRODUCTION & PROCESS CONTROLS-CNBC TV18 Source text: bit.ly/2uPxn19 Further company coverage:
